tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Caroline is the best professor I\'ve ever had. She knows what she\'s talking about (having two deaf parents), she really cares about her students, and she makes class so incredibly enjoyable. I HIGHLY recommend taking her class even if you\'re not an Elementary Education major.

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She is amazing! Class gets out early, she just expects that you show every time ready to participate. She is wonderful!

comments: Caroline is the greatest Sign Language professor! She knows her stuff and makes learning sign language fun.
